title: Tonight with Katherine Newbury
description: Host of Tonight for nearly 30 years, Katherine Newbury is an icon of late night televison.
quote: I hope I earned the privilege of your time.
altHero: Katherine Newbury laughs in front of a blue velvet curtain
alt1: Newbury chats with YouTube star Mimi Mismatch
alt2: Newbury in her “White Savior” sketch talking to two Black men on the streets of New York
alt4: Newbury giving an emotional opening monologue
